text: Terry Jones (born October 1951) is the pastor of Dove World Outreach Center, a small nondenominational Christian church located, until July 2013, in Gainesville, Florida, USA. He is the President of a political group, Stand Up America Now. He ran for President of the United States in 2012 and 2016. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:American Evangelicals Category:American Christian clergy Category:Islamophobia Category:People from Cape Girardeau, Missouri Category:2012 United States presidential candidates Category:2016 United States presidential candidates
title: Terry Jones (pastor)
